itemLabel: Marmaduke Hussey, Baron Hussey of North Bradley

wikipedia_page.main: Marmaduke James Hussey, Baron Hussey of North Bradley (29 August 1923 – 27 December 2006), known as Duke Hussey, was Chairman of the Board of Governors of the BBC from 1986 to 1996, serving two terms in that role.
